subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Max Siegel will leave Dale Earnhardt Inc. at the end of the month to manage the Drive for Diversity program, which aims to develop minority and female drivers in Nascar. Siegel spent the last two seasons as head of global operations for D.E.I., which was run by Dale Earnhardt’s widow, Teresa.
